articles.description: David Moyes says he understands West Ham fans’ frustrations after his decision to withdraw top scorer Gianluca Scamacca in yesterday’s 1-1 draw with Southampton was jeered by the away end.
articles.content:

articles.title: Scotland pull off impressive thrashing of West Indies in T20 World Cup - The Guardian
articles.description: Scotland claimed one of the greatest wins in their history, upsetting the odds at the T20 World Cup as they beat West Indies by 42 runs at Hobart
articles.content: Phil Simmons condemned his West Indies sides batting after the two-time T20 World Cup champions were thrashed by Scotland in their opening match of this years competition in Hobart. Chasing 161 to wi… [+3244 chars]

articles.content:
